mapper.sql: t.id id, t.yaid yaid, t.xgxx xgxx, t.zlmc zlmc, t.czyid czyid, t.czyxm czyxm, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, t.fjlxdm fjlxdm, t.jgid jgid, t.sjbb sjbb, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, t.sltfjdz sltfjdz
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YAXXZL t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = '1'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YAXXZL t WHERE t.JLZT = '1'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YAXXZL(id,yaid,xgxx,zlmc,czyid,czyxm,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,fjlxdm,jgid,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sltfjdz) VALUES(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zlmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fjlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sltfjdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YAXXZL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YAXXZL(id,yaid,xgxx,zlmc,czyid,czyxm,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,fjlxdm,jgid,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sltfjdz) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yaid,#{item.xgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgxx,#{item.zlmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zlmc,#{item.czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czyid,#{item.czyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czyxm,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.fjlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fjlxdm,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.sltfjdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sltfjdz
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), yaid = VALUES(yaid), xgxx = VALUES(xgxx), zlmc = VALUES(zlmc), czyid = VALUES(czyid), czyxm = VALUES(czyxm), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), fjlxdm = VALUES(fjlxdm), jgid = VALUES(jgid), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), sltfjdz = VALUES(sltfjdz)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_YAXXZL t WHERE t.JLZT = '1'
